snippet: Twelve, an imprint of Hachette Books, will release three titles that had gone out of print by the prolific author Christopher Hitchens, who died in December.
abstract: Twelve, an imprint of Hachette Books, will release three titles that had gone out of print by the prolific author Christopher Hitchens, who died in December.

headline.main: Three Hitchens Books Returning to Print
headline.print_headline: Three Hitchens Books Returning to Print
